title: ‘Attempted Manslaughter’ Spectator Turns Himself in to Police Following Paris-Roubaix Assault
content:
Mathieu van der Poel was hit in the face by a water bottle en route to Roubaix victory, and called for strong action.

Read the full article at ‘Attempted Manslaughter’ Spectator Turns Himself in to Police Following Paris-Roubaix Assault on Velo.
author: sstokes
